track.name: Save Your Tears (Remix) (with Ariana Grande) - Bonus Track

wiki.summary: The Weeknd links up with pop singer and past collaborator Ariana Grande for the remix of his hit track “Save Your Tears” from his 2020 record-breaking album After Hours. On April 19, 2021, a snippet of the remix was shared by both Ariana Grande and The Weeknd via their social media accounts, with audio showing both of them harmonizing. Ariana later announced via Instagram that the song would officially be dropping on the same week. Both artists confirmed that the song would be released on April 23, 2021. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: The Weeknd links up with pop singer and past collaborator Ariana Grande for the remix of his hit track “Save Your Tears” from his 2020 record-breaking album After Hours. On April 19, 2021, a snippet of the remix was shared by both Ariana Grande and The Weeknd via their social media accounts, with audio showing both of them harmonizing. Ariana later announced via Instagram that the song would officially be dropping on the same week. Both artists confirmed that the song would be released on April 23, 2021. On March 20, 2022, due to it gaining huge traction, and it being the 2 year anniversary of After Hours existing, it was added to the After Hours (Deluxe) album. Read more on Last.fm.
